content.detailedDescription: I have seen the same formation in oct @ 6 am approx.2 on each side & one on top, in oct no other stars visible, sun coming up, they outlined a huge pine, flickered white and red, would move horizontally short distances. this am i saw above and around orion. same formation, same flickering red and white. they were a bit wider in appearance than the other stars.  one moved like a falling star, then lit up red when it relocated closer to the top one. the 2 on the right would send off beams of red light to eachother in an arch and straight lines, sometimes at the same time both directions but would take turns as if to communicate? then the one that moved would also do the same with the top largest one. there is always a cloud cover mist after watching them for more than 5 min, covers the 2 on the right both times. no other clouds visible in the sky! the one on left bottom seems to be a look out, or a guard to the others since it doesn't do anything except change shape from sparkly to boomerang shape, red flashes on a constant basis. looking like a shooting star both times in movement is clever, when it comes to a stop it doesn't disappear, it is just as bright. picture the formation as a house connect the dots, one on the base, straight up vertical one at roofline, diagonal to the one at the peek, diagonal back down to one at roofline, straight down to one at base. i can see in distance smaller sparkly formations, but they do disappear. my son witnessed the first sighting with me in oct. i have seen them here in maine growing up. come to think it, they have always been in the same general south west location! i'm glad they are watching, tracking our world chaos. for some reason looking and watching has always brought tears to my eyes, not crying, just watering up of my eyes, no sadness, if i don't wipe them away they stream down my cheeks. i noticed my son wiping his eyes too! i had thought it was just my own reaction but apparently not.
content.summary: I've seen them before in oct, around 6 am eastern time, always 5. maybe more farther distance.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: At appx 10:00pm on nov 15, 2014, i was walking my dog around the block from my residence. i was on franquette st heading south and then turned on to a path that connects me to martha way along the field behind my home, east. i turned onto the path, passed a large redwood tree growing on the front of the property along franquette st. and then a red light or glow in the sky caught my eye and i saw the ufo or craft ascending into the sky from about a 73 degree angle in the ne sky while heading sw towards me. it ascended up over my head and passed into the sw sky. i turned completely around and watched while it ascended into the cloud cover above, until it disappeared. at first it appeared about the size of a penny and just before it disappeared i'd say it was the size of an aspirin. when i first laid eyes on it, i thought it was maybe a child's toy drone or maybe an adults drone(!?) but i've never seen one like this! or some kind of floating lantern or some kind of illuminated, triangular rocket-shaped balloon; but then it rotated a bit and i could see the wings on it. kind of like the wings on a rocket shaped craft; but the body of this thing was more triangular shaped with the wider part of the body almost more rectangular when you can't see the wings. when it rotated i could see the wings coming to a point at the nose and getting wider toward the base or back end. once i realized it was ascending and moving towards me, i realized it was moving rather quickly both up and ne. i estimated i watched it about 7 minutes, maybe 5 at the least till it was out of sight. don't know how to estimate mph for something like this. i still have an old cell phone, so didn't even try to take a picture cause it just wouldn't have turned out anything. darn! gotta get a new phone!! sorry about that. i did think about it at the time and would have if the camera had been any good. i remember looking around hoping to see someone else maybe out walking their dog too! so i could show them and ask what they thought it was. cars were going by on the street, no one seemed to notice. there were no dog walkers. i was literally standing right across from the local high school, where a game had ended about 30 min prior. there were people working out there cleaning up with all the bright lights on. but no one was looking up! everyone else had gone home. i just couldn't believe it. was i the only one to see this??? surely there is someone else out there who saw this thing and maybe even got a picture too!! i hope. because this craft was glowing red, i couldn't help think it was a child's toy. you know, red! red, toy red, festive red, happy red, party red. but red also means other things to other people. warning red, stop red, danger red, toxic red. i wonder what this red meant?? there were no lights on this thing. it just glowed red and i think i could see what looked like seams in the body of it. you know, darker lines where pieces were connected together perhaps. i could not see any windows. there might have been some, i just could not see them from where i was. it was obviously powered by something, but i couldn't hear it making any sound from my vantage point.
content.summary: Red glowing craft ascended for appx 7 min from ne while heading sw, up through the cloud cover until gone. craft rotated slightly revealing triangular wings protruding from it. 2 maybe 4-don't know for sure.

content.detailedDescription:
While driving home i saw a bright light hovering on the opposite side of the main road across from
me my subdivision. as i turned into my subdivision i lost sight of it due to my direction of travel. i then saw it again as i made another turn and it appeared to be much closer. when i turned on the street be for my street i could see a very bright light, i would estimate less than 100 feet above ground,in the direction of my house. as i turned on my street, i realized that it was next to my house. i backed into my driveway and was afraid to get out of my car because it was so close. i am not a fearful person but was told terrified by this incident. i started to video but then became afraid to have my phone up in the window to video. i sat my phone in my lap and laid the seat back in my car so that i was laying down i watched the light for over an hour and it would disappear then reappear in the same place. most of the time it was hovering but occasionally made sudden, short but very rapid movements sometimes horizontally and vertically. there was absolutely no noise coming from the object. i was so afraid that i didn't get out of the car until it ascended high enough that i felt comfortable that i could get to my door but i could still see the object. while the object was in close range i was nearly paralyzed with fear, as i have never seen anything like it in my life. i am familiar with all types of aircraft and i do not know of anything that can hover at this altitude and make no noise. i was able to get 13 minutes of video that i was unaware i was taping i have provided this video to the state director of mufon.
content.summary: Hovering light, occasionally moved in an erratic manner, disappearing then reappearing in same place

content.detailedDescription:
While walking my dog, all of a sudden i witnessed red and green lights,
come zooming over my head in the night sky and moved in a straight line.
no sounds could be heard and lights vbanished almost as quickly as they appeared.
content.summary: Fast moving red and green lights

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i stepped out on our porch to smoke and very quickly noticed the craft. it was hovering to the south of our house towards town and was moving back and forth up and down.We watched it for 10 minutes or so from the porch, we could hear a electrical hum coming from it's direction.  we went inside and watched it for another 30 minutes before it simply vanished. we both had an eerie feeling the entire time. just before it left i walked up on the hill above our house to get a better look, whatever it was it was huge. you could see the light pattern on it and could make out the triangular shape. but considering how high it was you could still see how big it was.
content.summary: Seen hovering over the coal mine and city of gillette.

content.detailedDescription:
I'm a security officer at a lowes home improvement store. i was doing a parking lot patrol in the truck. when i was coming back to park the truck, i glanced up and saw 4 glowing red lights moving in one direction. one kept getting close to another. i went to go park the truck and hurried back. but couldn't see them anymore. i walked back and forth to see if they were really gone. about 5 minutes later i saw one in the sky.
i quickly took out my phone but couldn't get the camera to open up quick enough.
the single glowing object seemed to turn and disappear.
i don't know if it was a helicopter an airplane but the way they were moving made me not believe it was an airplane. please contact me again if you were able to find out what that was. thanks again!
content.summary: I'm a security officer at a lowes home improvement store. i was doing a parking lot patrol in the truck. when i was coming back to park the truck, i glanced up and saw 4 glowing red lights moving in one direction.

content.detailedDescription: Looked like comet crashing with a jet like sound followed by a boom and shaking
content.summary: Looked like comet crashing

content.detailedDescription:
I was parked in my travel trailer watching a movie when i decided to go outside to use a bathroom. i was facing west when something caught my eye to the south about 100 feet in the air.  
it was before the moon had appeared on the horizon and the sky was very dark, the stars that night were very bright the time was approximately 6:45 pm (i sent my sister a text message about ufo at 6:49 pm). when i looked up to the south i was looking directly at a metal tower of some sort (radio-telephone) with a red light on top. there was some illumination from a billboard in front of tower. i saw a silent shape move very slowly perhaps 25mph (guess) fly over the tower and my head and continue to the north i was only able to see the ufo from roughly 60 yards away to the south and 60 yards away to the north. i could only see a moving blur until the object was directly overhead and the stars in the background were covered up as the shape passed between them and me, it was then i could see the outline of the craft. it appeared to be a diamond shape. if the stars weren't there i would have not been able to see the shape. i would guess its wing span was 25 foot to 50 foot max. i was so excited and in shock it is hard to say for sure on the size. i was very excited and not at all scared like one may think. i was wishing i could have watched it longer. the sighting occurred on hwy 97 in oregon just se of the diamond lake junction turn off. if i was to guess i would say it must have been military or a drone but the fact it was completely silent has me puzzled.
content.summary: I was parked on hwy 97 just south east of diamond lake junction saw silent black ufo traveling s to n

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Driving home late morning up arkadelphia. large trees along and over street. came to a clearing where you see lots of sky. i noticed and object and did not thing much about it because planes regularly cross going to air port. it was still there. i saw it was much larger than a commercial aircraft. also, its structure was like a huge + sign with the core being thick tapering to the ends. the ends had tree type antennas. the top one being huge, the ones on the sides smaller. i do not recall much about the bottom portion. it seemed to be a purely technical craft as it had tons, like way more than 50 (hundreds) of different kinds of antennas. the core was structurally build like one would see on a military ship. like everything had a purpose and no space was wasted.

i did not see anything that looked like windows or such and did not see anything that would indicate a propulsion system that i would recognize or guess at.

as i was driving north the unit did not move east or west, nor south that i could tell. about all airplanes that pass that way travel west to east, ne to the airport. i got 3 to four good looks trying to study it as best i could while not stopping in the road and getting clobbered in the rear. not much traffic usually there, but i was not wasting time to look in the mirror or anything. barely took time to glance ahead just to make sure i wasn't going to hit anything and i was still on the road.

as reached the part where the tree limbs blocked the sky view i was pretty darn under the thing, at least by my guess. i speed up to get to the street i turn right on (direction to the airport) about 1, 1.5 blocks away to see if i could see it headed toward the airport looking to my right. i saw nothing, drove slow.  yea, i should have parked at the curb, ran back around the corner, but i didn't.

no photos, evidence or anything. a friend did ask me to try to draw what i saw. i grabbed a google image and did my sloppy best with notes if that is of interest. i'll include if there is an option for that. sorry, i don't draw.

ps i do not agree at the bottom at the moment, but leave the option open to change that if you think it helpful at some point for some reason. with no pictures or evidence and i don't know of another witness i just wanted to share what i saw. to me it was a very surprising, interesting opportunity and experience i wasn't expecting. i have not found any mention of this event online. today i considered possibly going over to the college monday, because it is right there to see if anybody there had seen or mentioned anything.

this thing was larger than a commercial jet. my gut was like 3 times as long and wide. i was even trying to compare to how it would compare to the size of the nearby stadium and i thought it would fit in there quite nicely but stick up really high out of it.

errors: elevation in degrees doesn't make sense in this case so i just plug something in. it was right there. in front and above me. due to its size it makes it difficult to estimate distance. i'd say 500-1500ft. i don't know what low altitude for planes is right there not that it was a plane because it wasn't. a plan would have been moving to the airport. this thing stayed right there, unless it was mosying my direction, south.
content.summary: Big, right in front above the road going up a hill. i drove under it. lost sight when went under large tree.

content.detailedDescription: I was randomly looking outside when my head shot towards a specific direction as if someone had moved my head for me. i noticed a very bright red pulsating light ascending into the sky in an impeccably straight path until it eventually disappeared.
content.summary: Pulsating red light ascending into sky

content.detailedDescription: In my backyard, as i was observing the sky through a telescope i had received earlier this year, i found a red and white star-like object hovering in the atmosphere. at first i thought it was just an ordinary star until i noticed it started moving. i turned my attention towards it and snapped this photograph of it that you'll see. at first it just hovered there, and appeared to make a strange buzzing noise. i then took into consideration there was an airplane flying directly above me so i shrugged off that factor. i then began noticing it disappeared into the night in a flash. i was not sure whatsoever how i felt. i felt proud and ecstatic i found a ufo, but then i felt saddened by the fact people would see this as fake. i then put the image onto a flash drive and set it to my computer, and after a few minutes i saw the lights, appearing much different than the stars around it. i then went to the internet to try and find images of this either sky or specific ufo but all i found were pictures of the sky appearing much like the one last night. i'm not sure if this ufo is true or me hallucinating or seeing things, but i think it should be filed here.
content.summary: I saw this light in the sky, red, it hovered in the air for a minute or 2 and then left.

content.detailedDescription: My sister sighted six orange yellow  orbs after getting off of work at 10:00 pm saturday the 1st here in sheridan, wyo. . she said they were as bright as the street lights but were up in the sky . three were to the west and two to the north. one more came up and joined the ones up north of town. then one headed n/w  the rest vanished. she took a cell phone photo but it was a poor shot and was erased .They were in formations. they were big enough my sister thought the moon was up but in the wrong spots.  i myself seen a u.F.O. in the summer of 2012 on the south side of our k-mart. it was cigar shaped. a dull white. about two inches in diameter and about one foot in length. it was flying about 20 feet off of the ground and flying from west to east at about 9:30 am. a cousin seen a u.F.O fly along the top of the hills south of gillete ,wyoming in mid 70s. all of the sightings were silent, no engine sounds. we are not alone. seti does not need to listen to space communication. get a chair and watch the night skies and take a camera with you. it is going to be my new hobby.
content.summary: Six orbs sighted.

content.detailedDescription:
on the night of july 21st 2014 my friend and i were in the backyard enjoying the warm evening. i spend most of my time leaning against the truck hoping for some stars to shine through the overcast sky as we smoked and talked life. while chatting something drew my attention to the front of the house...And as i started walking along the side of house my friend called to me from the back yard saying "come look at this". i immediately turned and went back..Something in his tone..After turning the corner my friend was looking up to the northeast and i followed his gaze. there were 2 orange/yellow orbs crossing the sky, slowly and without noise. we just looked at each other and continued to watch as the first disappeared and as the second one moved off another came in behind. i then remarked to my friend "i'm glad you're here this time to see this" as i jumped up into the truck bed and stood on the rails for a better view. from this higher advantage point i could see 3 orbs, they seemed to be coming out of the nne
but making a slow arc or turn to the ne-east..Something clicked in my mind and i asked my friend to get his camera..He had never before or since moved so fast and was in the house and back in seconds. he begin taking pictures and a video of the objects as they came into sight while i remained standing on the rails of the truck. i counted 9 orbs, all in a linear formation doing a slow arc appearing out of the nne turning and disappearing in the east. there was no sound heard(very quiet night)and i observed the orbs pulsating in a 1-2-pause-3 sequence...Orange-yellow-white as i studied them intently, i could or so it seemed feel the pulse.
these objects were moving too slow for an aicraft and the entire incident lasted about 4 minutes.
 the reason i was glad my friend was there and why this is the incident i am reporting is that i have had several different encounters over the previous months, this being the first with a witness and actually getting photos and a video. the previous events i have experienced...Were different..Really strange..Hard to explain in words...Hopefully you will inquire so that i could perhaps make more sense of it all. thank you.
content.summary: This event is one of several that i experienced..All different..This is the only one of which i have pictures and video

content.detailedDescription:
on november 8th at 1:15 am, my wife and i were lying in bed reading, at our home in duxbury, ma. she noticed something out the window and exclaimed "oh my god. i think i see a ufo". i jumped up and ran to the window, and lo and behold, i saw the most unusual extremely bright orange orb traversing the sky in a flight path similar to that of an airplane. it was so unusual that i was unable to gauge its approximate altitude. my guess would be slightly less than that of the typical airplane. to my eye it appeared about the size of a penny, whereas a jet in the sky would appear to be about the size of an ant. unlike an airplane, this orb was one solid luminous entity. it seemed to travel about twice the speed of the average jet in the night sky, maintained a remarkably even flight path, and eerily made no sound whatsoever. i could not make out the description of any type of craft per se, just a glowing orb. by the way, all nearby airports were long closed for the night.
   i'm very familiar with what is known as chinese lanterns which are set up into the sky. these are hot air bags set aflame that rise into the night sky, casting a fireball type image. they tend to rise (due to their heat) and can oftentimes get caught in the wind and move across the sky before eventually burning out. the orb i saw was not the same. it was much larger and brighter and traversed the clear night sky from the horizon in the west to the horizon in the east at a very steady pace. it gave off a tremendous amount of light. it also traveled much slower than a meteor or shooting star and never diminished or increased in speed or luminosity. it was always round like an orb and had the color and brightness of the setting sun over the ocean. the orb itself gave off no surrounding haze or glow and left no trail. 
   my wife and i watched in wonderment as this otherworldly night visitor traversed the sky and after about 30 seconds finally disappeared from our sight out into the eastern horizon. we were both immediately quite certain that we had witnessed a space craft that i could only describe as otherworldly. we were very excited but neither of us were scared. in fact, it had an odd calming effect because the object itself seemed so intelligent and sophisticated. i wouldn't hesitate to use the term spiritual.
   our exciting night immediately got a whole lot more interesting when we suddenly noticed an exact similar orb appearing precisely where the first one came from. this second orb was the exact same size and color as the first, and traveled precisely the same flight path. as this second light eventually started disappearing from view, yet another orb came along in the same flight path. we saw three identical orbs over the course of under 5 minutes. i know that it wasn't one orb circling back because i distinctly saw two at the same time. after a 10 minute hiatus, a 4th orb appeared and behaved exactly the same. after that there were no more.
   the experience was so magical that it never occurred to me to leave the window and get a camera. put me down as a first-time ufo believer.
content.summary: 4 extremely bright orange orbs traversing the night sky in succession, spaced a few minutes apart

content.detailedDescription:
First i wanna say , is sorry for my bad english. :)

second i wanna say, its not my first sighting.

third i wanna say is, i know , how helicopters and airplanes look like.
i often saw airplanes and helicopters at night and day and identify them easily, because 2 km from here was an german air force base.

fourth is important to know that i don t exactly the day and month it happened. it is now about 4 month ago.
a balloon, zeppelin, whether effect, helicopter, airplane,or ir-controlled things or anything else is not an option for my sighting.
 
i was standing by my brothers window and looked outside because i saw a strange bright yellow light about 6:00 - 7:30 pm .

first i clearly saw, was an solid egg-like.
it was very huge, it had the dimension of two 737 in wideness.
(i fly every year in 737 so i know the exact dimensions)
it was in low high , i would say about 50 - 60 meter .

it had absolute no sound - no noise.

it was yellow- to orange not glowing but shining surface (texture) with single patterns which where seems to be  lighted in yellow/white bright lights.

colors don t changed, direction not changed and speed not changed, no noise or sound at all.

it was slowly 15-30 km /h and flew straight and get out of my vision.

complete time of sighting was about 1 minute and i had enough time to get a friend and my brother to the window, so i have two witnesses.

i swear this is the truth and i would like to know the truth, what this object was. have two eye-witnesses.
content.summary: Was like egg,but sharp 90 degree edges, single sections with bright lights, loudless

content.detailedDescription: "it was the evening of 06.22.2013 the evening of the great moon. i was back in my apertment after a day out with my friends in dublin. i was admiring the great moon when i saw like small explosions coming out of the moon. it was incredible. i saw very bright dots that were bigger than stars. then i noticed that there where three spheres moving slowly near the moon that sudenly disapeard. it was spectacular".
content.summary: Big white bright sphere explode from the moon

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures on a sail and noticed this in the picture at a later date i never saw it in person
content.summary: taking pictures on lake and saw in photo at later date

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to my family with my parents and my sister in bat-yam (near to tel-aviv),
on my way to bat-yam i noticed a flashing light like i described early...
at that time i believed a little bit in ufo's/aliens so i was very curious.
so i opened my phone i had back then (htc one x) and took a picture of it with zoom!
and then i looked and i saw this: http://up389.Siz.Co.Il/up1/mu23wmnmgzzu.Jpg
i was amazed!
when i got back home i sent it to eura (the israeli ufo research) and they said that they will answer me son and they haven't...
also i post it in science fiction forum, here is a link to the post: [link moved to fi section/cms/tg] (it's in hebrew).
i'll be glad if you can give me an answer about what i saw.
thank you
content.summary: Flashing colorful lights, fast

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were going to las vegas.  we left salt lake city around 11:00 pm.  when we got just outside of scipio utah my friend said "holy *+=&^- there is a ufo".  i leaned forward and looked up and there was a round object maybe 100 feet above the road pacing us.  it had orange paneled lights emitting from the bottom it was perfectly round as viewed from underneath it.  

i had never heard anything negative about ufo's at the time so i immediately hit the breaks and started to pull over (for me it was the most exciting thing that had ever happened).   my friend however was so scared and terrified that i was worried about her health.  i have never in my life witnessed so much fear in a person and so i did not pull over but rather just kept on going.  i did not see it but she said we lost sight of it in some trees near the road.

just after we lost sight of the ufo i felt a strange and uncomfortable energy enter into the car.  i practice a form of energy healing for a living and so i forcefully surrounded the car in light which made the energy undetectable.  just as i did this my friend said "*&^* (and then my name).  i thought she could feel the energy from the ufo and also the energy that i used to surround the car but later i found out that she felt neither of these things but was only just commenting on the fact that we had seen a ufo.

when there was time i asked my friend why she was so scared and she told me that she has memory of being abducted when she was a child and that she has had dreams ever since around the subject of having to at some point go back with them and she thought they were there to take her.

over the next few months (maybe nine) i had some pretty intense encounters with what i believe are attempted abductions.  i would be willing to share these with a researcher.
content.summary: We saw a ufo directly above out car on i-15 near scipio utah around 100 am.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at the stars on a clear night. i noticed two satellite looking lights streaking across the sky relatively faster than a plane, but slower than a satellite, in a parallel formation. they then, very quickly, started zig zagging in a way that resembled a double helix of dna before finally disappearing. i've watched the sky plenty of times in my life, i've seen meteors, satellites, planes, etc.. yet what i saw was nothing like i've ever seen
content.summary: Two satellite looking lights were streaking across the sky parallel to each other, they then zig-zagged and dissappeared

content.detailedDescription:
while driving west in the 43 hundred block of west irvington rd southwest of tucson, i observed a chevron display of orange lights in the western sky. the object was stationary, straight ahead more than 1000' in altitude and more than a mile away.
 i knew that it was not an airplane because of the light configuration. this object was in between the approach paths of dmafb and tucson international airport. there were no red and green blinking lights.
 i observed the object for about 10 seconds till it blinked off, out of sight. in a few seconds it reappeared, only this time it was farther to the south by more than a mile. five seconds later it blinked off again and disappeared.
 this side of town is heavy with air traffic, especially at that time of the evening but, the object was of no airplane configuration i have ever seen.
content.summary: Compressed triangle of 3 orange lights

content.detailedDescription: I was at home on 11-14-14 in birmingham, alabama viewing the sandpiper beacon west web cam located on the beach in panama city beach, florida at 7:50pm cst. viewing west toward gulf breeze from the beach out over the gulf. i noticed numerous white lights (black/white screen) that would appear and fade out, brightening and sometimes pulsating other than the normal two stars that was not visible at the time but where visible later.  most of the lights where high above the horizon but one was on the horizon and most over the gulf and one or two near land. some became very bright and did not seem to move and would fade out after about 15 seconds. i had seen lights before on other occasions that seem to move that i assumed where helicopters, airplanes or ships. i did not get that impression this time. these 6 to 10 lights where more numerous than my normal observations and would appear and disappear at different locations with several visible at the same time. i observed these lights for about 15 minutes. the shape of the lights appeared to just be balls of light with the cam resolution.  i stopped watching after the activity decreased. i would just like to know if there where any other unusual reports of lights by anyone actually near that location and around that time?
content.summary: Sandpiper beacon-  observed numerous unusual lights other than normal stars.

content.detailedDescription: I was getting into my car. i heard a low loud hum. i looked up in the direction i heard the noise. above the power lines i saw a huge dull gun metal grey triangular boomerang shaped flying object. each wing had a light of amber like red. it hovered momentarily, cloaked...Meaning all i could see were the lights and a shape that blocked the stars as it sped off at a high rate of speed. this all happened in about a minute. it was not a plane. it was 3x the size of a low flying plane. before i got into my car i noticed about 4 helicopters circling in the area, which is not an abnormal event around here.
content.summary: Heard a loud low hum overhead, saw large triangular ufo with two amber lights. hovered, cloaked, shot forward fast.

content.detailedDescription:
Ll-08-2014 ufos over coon valley, wi

tonight 11-08-2014 at about 5:41 pm  i was coming home from deer hunting when i had a strange experience.  i was near the coon valley post office when i noticed a strange light in the sky.  i watched it as it move to the se at a slow speed, and then moved upward got smaller and disappeared.  where it went i do not know.  next a second light appeared to the west of the first ufo it made some strange moves, was very bright and very strange.  like the first it had a fairly bright center with an orange glow around it.  i photographed this ufo, and the photo below is of this second of the two ufos.  both look similar.  i detected no sound; however the traffic sound on highway 14 was loud, and made it hard to hear.  i hope others seen these two ufos too.   both ufos (never together went from west to south east in erratic patters of flight.  each took about 40 to 50 seconds or so from first appearance to their slowly ascending and apparent disappearance.  there was an overcast sky, and they were below the clouds; however, they may have disappeared by flying through the clouds and becoming no longer visible as a result.  the distance they traveled is at best a guess, and that would be around 1 to 1 ½ miles.  i do not know if anyone else noticed these two objects.  the photo is a blow up of the image i took of the 2nd object.  my camera was at perhaps 50x optical, and i cropped the photo to see if any details would appear.  the photo appears as strange as the object appeared to my eyes.  if it was terrestrial my best guess is a helicopter; however they did not appear to be helicopters or aircraft since no flashing lights.
content.summary: Strange light as attached photo shows.  about 3 to 4 times size of venus in the sky below overcast sky.

content.detailedDescription: I had taken our dog out for her morning run, (4clear sky conditions) when i looked up at the eastern part of the sky to see a passenger jet flying overhead. above the jet was the ufo that i witnessed, it was a bright disc shaped object flying very fast in a straight line until it disappeared over the horizon. thought it might be the iss or a satellite but checked the databases online and non was scheduled at that time.
content.summary: White disc shaped object moving very fast west to east across the sky

content.detailedDescription: We first observed orb like lights taking off from the tree line in the northwest and shooting up into the only cloud in the sky where they were all congregating. shortly after several launches, there was a craft that was solid red probably about 20 miles away in the west. the craft was heading east and remained solid red until it was about 50 yards outside of our bedroom window and did a quick directional change and turned solid blue and then immediately solid green. while it was changing colors, it also changed shape. it emitted a very strange buzzing noise and went from a triangular shape to almost a bug like shape and then sped off and turned solid white. the craft was probably a hundred feet long or so. it appeared to be chasing the small red orbs. after this large craft was out of sight, all of the orbs came out of the single cloud and started going every direction. they would randomly change altitude and go from north to south and east to west in the blink of an eye. another large craft was witnessed coming over the hills to the east and it was maybe 500 feet or so off the ground. it was red white and green and it made no sound at all. all of these events were witnessed by myself, my wife, my 22 year old son, and my 14 year old daughter. this event lasted for over 2 hours. the weirdest thing was when one craft looked like it had a force field around it went about a hundred feet over my house again making no noise at all, went out to the middle of our field and then disappeared at the speed of light. this was also witnessed by all of us. every animal was howling and making as much ruckus as possible. once all of the activities stopped in the sky, all animals went silent. this event ended shortly before 2 o'clock in the morning. all of this took place in enumclaw washington on november 13th 2014. we were unable to get video of the craft while it was close to our house because none of our cell phones would work. my daughter was able to get a video at a distance the third time the triangular shaped craft was making the rounds again.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 very large crafts and more than 30 little ones

content.detailedDescription: Went out on my 2nd floor deck to have a cigarette after watching tv program at about 10 pm and was startled to see 2 huge, bright orange objects in the sky in front of me, roughly in the sky above the new york city area. because the area is close to newark airport my initial reaction was i thought 2 planes were on fire. then i realized the objects were not moving but rather were hovering next to each other. there was no noise. after about 20 seconds of stunned disbelief, i called my wife out to the deck and she also observed the objects. at this time a plane was crossing directly under the objects en route to landing at newark airport. the objects continued to hover for approximately 30 more seconds as the plane landing at newark passed below and in front of them, all the while glowing a bright orange/red color. the objects then started to get smaller as they appeared to be rising into the sky. within 5-10 seconds, as they got smaller and smaller, they just winked out of sight. the total time of observation was about 1 minute.
content.summary: While standing on my deck observed 2 bright orange objects in sky hovering next to each other. they then got smaller as they ascended and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
three days before christmas, 2013 i saw weird things in the sky. for three nights in a row. and on christmas night i took a video of it for
the last time. it was from 4 am - 7:45 am. the lights would split apart,
and i saw two white lights shoot bright blue beams to each other. i was
thinking maybe they were communicating w/ each other, but i don't know
the reason for sure. but using my binoculars i could see the energy
exchange very good. before i taped, i saw a bright white light like a dot
and it was moving as if it had a tail dancing really fast from it, like a candle flame when its moving, but this was bright white. i have no idea what that was...But i haven't seen it since. i always look out my 3rd floor window so that's why i notice these things.
content.summary: I have film.  i would like to send a copy of it. shooting bright blue beams..

content.detailedDescription:
I was near the economic faculty in our capital, in a local bar.I was sitting with one girl and one boy, students of the economic faculty in the time that the event took place.In those moments a huge force blocked my heart and brain, and i was like a statue, in my soul i felt the smell of basil, it was as a clinical death to me, people who were around i just could not see them and i hardly listened to them. than that same force moved me throw the cosmos and there i felt the tremendous force of gravity. i was very cold and  because of the force of the gravity i felt that i could be fractured into pieces. furthermore, i heard a sound of a engine like from an airplane. than that same force brought me inside the ufo.When that same force brought me inside, in that same moment i knew that those are entity’s and a object from another civilization.As i already sad i was witness of the object but inside the ufo, so about the actions that the entity’s did i can assure you that i know the process but because is very complicated i want to speak about this with someone directly from your organization. and if is possible even if needed to do that in the usa. so about the motions and actions of the ufo outside i can not witness because i have seen it inside.In those moments i was very upset and afraid , because i could not describe the appearance and did not know if i would stay alive and will that same force brought me back to earth. and about the actions, i had no power over myself and this same force opened my eyes and showed the actions of the entity’s inside the ufo and for sure it showed me the process of flying with the ufo. this is also important that after so many years occasionally, while watching television it reminds me on the most important action of the process of flying with the ufo. i strongly believe that during me being inside the ufo i was invisible for the entity’s, because one of the entity’s was like three feet’s from me and i thought that it was watching me and like it was smiling to me, it was faintly in his face it had long face and it had long yellow hair, also long beard, unshaved. what wondered me the most was that it moved the eyelids fast and i could not see the color of his eyes. those entity’s are about 110 cm tall, they walk slowly, they have small fingers of their hands and also they have a strong tone of voice. while walking they walk with bent knees.That same force ejected me from the same entry i got inside. the entry was on roof of the ufo.I also want to say that while they are walking
they snore and also they had very sophisticated equipment. i saw two entity's doing the process of flying with the ufo.They work very precisely
and their process of flying is divided.In addition i have that sketch from
the inside of the ufo that you can also see, for the colors of some things
i remember, for some i do not, but the system of flying i know it perfectly
and i need people that can test me about this things, because i want to build the ufo with you.Because with these flyings object's usa may become
the most powerful cosmic power in the world,it would be possible to conquest the planet's far away with crew's, and minimum spent energy.I hope
to hear from you soon and also hope that you understand me because the society where i live does not.
best regards
content.summary: First i would like to point out, that i have seen the ufo inside with it's two entity's.

content.detailedDescription: Hola bueno esto me sucedio en huancayo una ciudad donde se aprecia el cielo estrellado siempre observo los cielos ya sea buscando estrellas fugaces aviones y cosas extrañas para mi suerte fui testigo ocular de este fenomeno mas de 2 veces pero la ultima vez q vi este fenomeno fue en un lugar publico  donde pude hacer ver a demas personas sobre estas luces extrañas en el cielo , seria aprox las 7 ya estaba oscuro cuando de pronto vi como 2 estrelolas fugaces haciendo circulos en el cielo una ala par de otra sincronizadamente dejaban un rastro como si fueran chispas lo bueno es que no solo lo vi yo ya que tambien lograron apreciar el fenomeno varias personas en el lugar donde me encontraba gracias
content.summary: Ovnis en cielo de huancayo
